dataset_id: SMAPVEX19-21 Millbrook Temporary Soil Moisture Network V001
title: SMAPVEX19-21 Millbrook Temporary Soil Moisture Network V001
summary: These data consist of soil moisture sensor, soil temperature and air temperature measurements recorded by 25 temporary stations in the Millbrook (MB) experiment location during SMAPVEX19-21. The stations were spread out over the experiment domain of about 30 by 40 km located around Millbrook, NY. The stations were installed in May 2019 and are to continue operation until November 2021.
